EmailTemplate.description: Site Survey Date Has Been Set or Changed
EmailTemplate.name: Site Survey Date Has Been Set or Changed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} - {!Account.BillingAddress} Site Survey Scheduled Date Has Been Set or Changed - {!Opportunity.Site_Audit_Completed_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Site Survey Scheduled Date has been set or changed to {!Opportunity.Site_Survey_Time__c} for {!Opportunity.Contact__c} at {!Account.BillingAddress}.
Regards, Palmetto (855) 339-1831
